Exactly as the other Mario explained (thanks <@892053833121923094>! üôÇ ) , bomb raises difficulty per block which decreases block time but difficulty over time stays roughly the same. Details on estimating mainnet TTD are in this write up https://notes.ethereum.org/@MarioHavel/merge-ttd
